宭字的基本解释

宭
qún
群居。
聚集的地方：学宭。

宭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qún］
［《廣韻》渠云切，平文，羣。］
(1)群居。
(2)引申为某种事物荟萃之处。
(3)通“窘”。窘迫。

宭字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宭； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页285第15
【玉篇】仇文切【唐韻】【韻會】渠云切【集韻】衢云切，?音羣。【說文】羣居也，與羣通。　又【廣韻】舉云切【集韻】拘云切，?音君。義同。

宭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
宭字的起名意思

群居；引申为某种事物荟萃之处；通"窘"。窘迫。

Ruin
Basic explanation of words
Ruin
qún
social.
Place of gathering: Xue Mi.
Ruin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qún］
["Guangyun" Qu Yunqie, plain text, group. ]
(1) Group living.
(2) The extension is a place where something gathers.
(3) "Embarrassed". Embarrassment.
Ruin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【The first chapter of Yin Ji】【The Department of Mi characters】　宭; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 285 to 15
[Jade articles] Qiu Wenqie [Tang Yun] [Yunhui] Qu Yunqie [Jiyun] Qu Yunqie, sound group. [Speaking text] Living in groups, and communicating with groups.　[Guang Yun] Ju Yunqi [Ji Yun] Ju Yunqi,? Yin Jun. The same meaning.

Name meaning
Living in groups; by extension, it is a place where something gathers together; through "difficulty". Embarrassment.
qún
* гл. жить скопом (вместе); коллективно
